Text: How do I get rid of all those bags and the open doors in the VC version when I choose to fly with this?, Ive tried Shift+E 1 and all of those combiantions but the doors dont close
I have the SR22, you need to pull up a gauge that opens and closes all those things. The short-cut should be Shift-8 or -9. Then click on the things and your various things should close.
Thanks QFA380, it works, the  short-cut is shift-9
